scripts.deploy: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); process.env.GITHUB_ACTIONS='true'; const url = execSync('git config --get remote.origin.url').toString().trim(); console.log('Deploying to', url); execSync('next build', { stdio: 'inherit' }); execSync('git config user.name \'github-actions[bot]\'' ); execSync('git config user.email \'github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com\'' ); execSync('echo > docs/.nojekyll'); execSync('git add docs/.nojekyll docs'); try { execSync('git commit -m \'Update docs folder [skip ci]\''); } catch (e) { console.log('No changes to commit'); }"
